titles.title: Mount Rushmore Improvements Act of 1987
A bill to provide for improvements to the Mount Rushmore Memorial.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources requested executive comment from Interior Department, OMB.

committee.subcommittee: Public Lands, National Parks and Forests
committee.name: Senate Energy and Natural Resources

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Mount Rushmore Improvements Act of 1987 - Directs the National Park Service to develop by the end of FY 1987 a comprehensive design and plan for upgrading and expanding the facilities at Mount Rushmore National Memorial, South Dakota. Authorizes appropriations.
